EmailTemplate.name: EBSH Reply Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your email.
This is an automated acknowledgement confirming that your query/request has been escalated for further investigation, please take note that you will receive updates as the investigation progresses.
Should you wish to follow-up on this query feel free to contact the Helpdesk on 0860 227 232 and quote the following reference: # {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Operating Hours
The Electronic Banking Service Helpdesk will be available: Monday to Friday 07:30 - 17:00 and Saturdays 07:30 - 10:30.
